column4: anyone know why i get permission denied (using sudo) when i do echo min_power > /sys/class/scsi_host/host0/link_power_management_policy
make sure you don't keep that permanant on yoru box, wouldn't want you breaking things
didn't work for me either.  You probably need to be logged in as root to do it
probably, like you said, to keep users from breaking the system
i'll just have to put it in acpi/acd.d instead i suppose
thankfully permission was denied for me :)
well i figured you kinda knew what you were getting yourself into ;-)
I figured it probably wouldn't work for me either :)
I've been running with my battery removed
yeah im just gonna break down and buy solid state and get a new battery since it's under warranty
I was thinking of getting solid state, but I don't really need it, and don't have money to spend on things that I don't really need
the prices have come down a lot though... maybe soon
